abstract: Sotheby's will auction a suite of four bronze sculptures of a woman's back that Matisse created over a period of 23 years beginning in 1908.
snippet: Sotheby's will auction a suite of four bronze sculptures of a woman's back that Matisse created over a period of 23 years beginning in 1908.

headline.print_headline: Four Matisse Sculptures To Be Auctioned
